title: Drawing, "Design for Textile-Greek Peasant", 1943
medium: Brush and pink, purple and turquoise gouache; graphite on tracing paper
signed: Lower right in pencil: Sandro Girard / 1943
inscribed: recto: in graphite, lower right: GREEK PEASANT / Sandro Girard / 1943
provenance: From the office of Alexander H. Girard
description: Stylized man and woman in peasant garb holding up a heart, alternating with bouquet of flowers.   Small turquoise and pink flowers.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Design for Textile-Greek Peasant", 1943.Brush and pink, purple and turquoise gouache; graphite on tracing paper. Gift of Alexander H. Girard. 1969-165-187.
